data.persona: I live in the kingdom.  I pay taxes to the king.  I dislike my lot in life.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
Large clear outdoor meadow. Flowers of blue and white appearing in bunches here and there. The grass glows with a green light. Not much can be said about its appearance, however there is a mystical allure associated with the place as if a meadow for spirits instead of livestock.
There's an a brook, an angel, a dead people, a flower, and a grass here.
The wasp is here.

You are carrying an fan, a pitcher, a pitcher of water, and a scrolls,, wearing a pant, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want these scrolls to learn a magic spell that will make me powerful.
data.mid_motivation: I want to win the respect of the king so he will make me rich and famous.
data.long_motivation: I want my family to have a nice life and not have to work in the fields like me.
